meanings.definition: Represent (letters or words) in the corresponding characters of another alphabet or language.
meanings.sent1: She transliterates the foreign words into English for better understanding.
meanings.sent2: The software transliterates the text from Russian to Mandarin.
meanings.sent3: He transliterates the menu items into emojis just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The artist transliterates emotions into vibrant colors on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The teacher transliterates complex ideas into simple drawings for the students.

meanings.definition: Convert (text) from one script into another.
meanings.sent1: The app transliterates the ancient text into modern language effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She transliterates the document from cursive to print for clarity.
meanings.sent3: He transliterates the recipe into a different font just for kicks.
meanings.sent4: The translator transliterates the poem into a beautiful song.
meanings.sent5: The machine transliterates the code into a readable format for the programmers.
